author: rjung
msg: Update release list in STATUS.

author: jleroux
msg: Makes fadeBackground="true" as it's by default in xsd and allow to pass disabled(true or false)

author: rjung
msg: Make buildconf in expat libtool 2 compatible.
- Add AC_CONFIG_MACRO_DIR to configure.in.
So libtoolize does copy in its m4 files.
Otherwise libtoolize --copy doesn't copy them.
- Add all of the libtool m4 files to aclocal.m4.
The single libtool.m4 file used by libtool 1
has been split into five files by libtool 2 and
we need them all.
Backport of r979102 from tne 1.5.x branch.
